original_text: And after six days Jesus took with him Peter and James and John, and led them up a high mountain by themselves. And he was transfigured before them,
korean_text: 엿새 후에 예수께서 베드로와 야고보와 요한을 데리시고 따로 높은 산에 올라가셨더니 그들 앞에서 변형되사

sentences.original_text: Jesus took with him Peter and James and John
and led them up a high mountain
And he was transfigured before them
